overview: Sid Knox directs Performers of the Year 2022, celebrating the nominees of the coveted AVN Female Performer of the Year award. Winner Gianna Dior is highlighted alongside Charles Dera in a salute to her incredible year of sexual performance. Alexis Tae and Ramon Nomar get down in a spicy anal scene; Kenna James gets worked over by Prince Yahsua; and Vanna Bardot, Jane Wilde and Zac Wild team up for a threesome.
title: Performers of the Year 2022
